item.description:
Zen Bar in Plainville, Connecticut is Everything to Everyone. For over a decade the Zen Bar has been the entertainment headquarter for central and western Connecticut and the #1 home for LIVE Bands and Karaoke.

 

  Our host John Carlo is eager to welcome us back for a night of fun, singing, dancing and has offered our group a round of those dangerous ZEN SHOTS on the house if you Dare!  

 

Karaoke starts between 8:30-9:00 pm.  The food from the pay as you go bar menu is great. Come have a bite and mingle as you get ready to cheer your fellow meetups belt out some tunes!     

 

You can find KARAOKE each Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Buzztime's HOSTED TRIVIA each Tuesday and LIVE BANDS on Thursdays and Saturdays. 

 

*Zen Bar is proud to have been voted 1st place for "Best Place for Live Music" in the Plainville Citizen's "Best of Awards."

 

*Zen Bar has been voted Best Karaoke in Connecticut by the Hartford Advocate year after year.

 

*Zen Bar has won the Best Bar Award for overall "Best Bar" west of the Connecticut River and one of only two best bars in the entire state of Connecticut by the readers of the Hartford Courant's CT.com. http://www.zenbar.com/menu/
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup area Seating will be reserved in front of the stage,

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Zen Bar for Karaoke and Casual Dining - Third time is a Charm!
